name: SnapMagic
headline: AI copilot for electronics design
description: Built by electrical engineers for electrical engineers, SnapMagic removes monotony so that engineers can do their best work. SnapMagic’s electronic component data is used by over 1.5 million engineers across the world’s largest organizations. Its new AI Copilot will change the way that every engineer designs electronics. Join at www.snapmagic.com.
markdown:
raw_markdown="[![SnapMagic logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/650ba0bd3c444474464afb88_snapmagic-logo.svg)](https://www.snapmagic.com/</>)[Products](https://www.snapmagic.com/</products>)
Company
[About](https://www.snapmagic.com/</about-us>)[Careers](https://www.snapmagic.com/<https:/careers.snapeda.com/>)
[Contact Us](https://www.snapmagic.com/</contact-us>)[For Component Suppliers](https://www.snapmagic.com/</for-component-suppliers>)
# Your AI Copilot‍for Electronics Design
Built on our massive database of CAD models, originally known as SnapEDA
[Join the waiting list](https://www.snapmagic.com/<#join>)
![snapmagic app showing how cmd k works and menu list](https://snapeda.s3.amazonaws.com/media/snapmagic/Hero_Header_Main_1.gif)
## Works with the tool you already use
![Altium logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/64905d9ea28739736fbfe175_a.svg)
![Autodesk Fusion 360 logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/65cd0a00f05956057e3bb716_fusion-blue.svg)
![Eage logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/64906ab664fa6e880b9a7bb0_e.png)
![Circuit Studio logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/64906ab7cedfd0da13f0508e_cs.png)
![KiCad logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/64b5e8291509df6af9172d27_cadence.svg)
![Zuken logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/64905da941ecae83932d67c8_z.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/653f14daf87406bdcd864965_arrow-2.svg)
## Use AI to auto-complete circuit board designs
[Auto-Complete Circuits](https://www.snapmagic.com/<#safari>)[Streamline Micro-Decisions](https://www.snapmagic.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
Auto-complete circuits
SnapMagic is your friendly co-pilot, making helpful recommendations to automate your circuit board design - with you always at the helm. 
Streamline micro-decisions
Trained on datasheets, SnapMagic takes the wheel on repetitive tasks like adding bypass capacitors, leaving you free to tackle the more challenging and gratifying aspects of your design.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/653f15665f6a5c22a90e8754_arrow-4.svg)
Use natural language to streamline your design process
[Chat with your circuit](https://www.snapmagic.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[Optimize for cost and power](https://www.snapmagic.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)
Use natural language to interact with your circuit
Chat with your circuit board design in the same way you'd chat with your co-worker. You can even automate entire schematics from scratch.
Optimize your BOM for cost and power
With SnapMagic, take your entire bill of materials (BOM) and streamline it effortlessly. Prioritize factors like cost or power and SnapMagic will suggest optimizations, including new components, to you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/648f8e2ee7f2243279b5f50c_Group%20225.svg)
Make informed decisions with real-time supply chain data
![Mouser Electronics logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/648f8ecb1719cb17513f87ee_mouser%201.png)
![Digi-Key Corp logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/64ba472c7e77798c55480e50_digikey.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/648f7d8ae7f2243279a8c89d_Group%20234.svg)
[Find replacements during shortages](https://www.snapmagic.com/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-0>)[Purchase BOMs with 1 click](https://www.snapmagic.com/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-1>)
Find replacements in the supply chain
SnapMagic is integrated with all major distributors, which means it can alert you if you are using out-of-stock parts and even suggests alternatives - all within your trusted circuit board design tool.
Purchase BOMs with 1 click
When your design is ready for manufacturing, check out your bill-of-materials from our distributor partners with just one click.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/653f15aa4241bde3df8d3c24_arrow-5.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/651fa44af679fee7c464a9bb_chip3.png)
At SnapMagic, we are creating a world where engineers can spend more time innovating.
We clear away the monotony so you can get into flow.
Built on trusted CAD data loved by over 1 million engineers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f8798ad7e987730511_nasa.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f8a28739736fcb10e2_apple.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f8e2a30562226511d3_samsung.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f8a8ae2a9c9743d155_lm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f85d9169ba1cf24a5a_gulf.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f892038771e4a180d4_mc.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f87e95f49862284d6e_dys.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f82495015645eb9d9c_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f8ae9eef47f458127b_ge.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f83bf40e5511a3b96b_amd.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/649065f86e06ca6b51538b6d_axiom.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/6491b5d210e117cbe3961b35_Frame.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/6491b5e3fd4ac778e957336c_Frafme.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648e7465292fcaf911b3f151/6491b5ea94988f25f71ed396_h.svg)

generated_description:
**SnapMagic: Your AI Copilot for Electronics Design**

Founded in 2015 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S15, SnapMagic is on a mission to revolutionize electronics design with its powerful AI tools. Based in San Francisco, this company started with a clear vision: to build a solution by engineers for engineers. It aims to remove the dull, repetitive tasks that typically bog down the design process, freeing up engineers to focus on what they do best—creating innovative electronics.

With over **1.5 million engineers** using their electronic component database—which traces its roots back to SnapEDA—SnapMagic has established itself as a trusted resource in the industry. The latest addition to their lineup, the **AI Copilot**, is designed to transform how engineers approach circuit board design. 

### Key Features of SnapMagic:
- **Intelligent Auto-Completion**: The AI Copilot assists with circuit completion and automates mundane tasks, like adding bypass capacitors, letting users focus on complex design challenges.
- **Natural Language Interaction**: Engineers can “chat” with their circuit designs, providing a conversational interface to streamline their workflow. This means automating entire schematics can be as easy as a couple of keystrokes.
- **Supply Chain Awareness**: Integrated with major distributors, SnapMagic keeps engineers informed about component availability, suggesting alternatives in real-time to prevent design setbacks caused by shortages.
- **Optimization**: Users can analyze their Bill of Materials (BOM) for cost and efficiency, with SnapMagic suggesting alternatives that meet their specifications.

SnapMagic stands out not just by alleviating the monotony of design work but also by facilitating real-time decision-making through dynamic supply chain data. The goal? To create a workspace where engineers can thrive and innovate without administrative distractions.

The company currently operates with a team of **28** employees and continues to pursue partnerships and collaborations that enhance its service delivery. 

If you’re an engineer tired of the tedious aspects of design or just want to see how AI can elevate your workflow, SnapMagic is worth a look. Check them out at [www.snapmagic.com](https://www.snapmagic.com/) and join the future of electronics design today.
